Classes¶

class bhp_consent.classes.BaseConsent(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_subject.classes.base_subject.BaseSubject

Consent models should be subclasses of this

Parameters:
  • subject_identifier (CharField) – Subject identifier
  • first_name (EncryptedFirstnameField) – (Encryption: rsa local)
  • last_name (EncryptedLastnameField) – (Encryption: rsa restricted)
  • initials (CharField) – Initials
  • dob (DateField) – Format is YYYY-MM-DD
  • is_dob_estimated (IsDateEstimatedField) – If the exact date is not known, please indicate which part of the date is estimated.
  • gender (CharField) – Gender
  • subject_type (CharField) – Subject type
  • study_site_id (ForeignKey) – This refers to the site or ‘clinic area’ where the subject is being consented.
  • consent_datetime (DateTimeField) – Consent date and time
  • guardian_name (EncryptedLastnameField) – Required only if subject is a minor. Format is ‘LASTNAME,FIRSTNAME’. All uppercase separated by a comma (Encryption: rsa restricted)
  • may_store_samples (CharField) – Does the subject agree to have samples stored after the study has ended
  • comment (EncryptedTextField) – (Encryption: aes local)
  • consent_version_on_entry (IntegerField) – Version of subject’s initial consent.
  • consent_version_recent (IntegerField) – Version of subject’s most recent consent.
  • is_verified (BooleanField) – Is verified
  • is_verified_datetime (DateTimeField) – Is verified datetime
save_new_consent()¶

Creates or gets a subject identifier and updates registered subject.

Users may override this to change the default behavior for new instances

class bhp_consent.classes.BaseConsentModelAdmin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_crypto.classes.base_cryptor_model_admin.BaseCryptorModelAdmin

Serves as the ModelAdmin for all consent models.

class bhp_consent.classes.BaseModelWithConsentAdmin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_crypto.classes.base_cryptor_model_admin.BaseCryptorModelAdmin

For models with a key to consent
